sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useQuery } from '@tanstack/react-query' function Details() { const { id } = useParams(); const history = useHistory(); const { isLoading, error, data } = useQuery({ queryKey: ['pokemon'], queryFn: () => fetch('https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/'+id) .then((res) => res.json(), ), }) if (isLoading) return 'Cargando...' if (error) return 'An error has occurred: ' + error.message const handlePrev = () => { if (id > 1) { history.push(`/details/${parseInt(id) - 1}`); } }; const handleNext = () => { history.push(`/details/${parseInt(id) + 1}`); }; return (
Nombre: {data.name}
Tipo: {data.types.map(type => type.type.name).join(", ")}
Altura: {data.height}''
Peso: {data.weight} lbs.



Estadisticas Base
{data.stats.map(stats => stats.base_stat).join(", ")}

Más Info

) }; export default Details
